entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023
